about_the_game:
EXPLORE, BUILD, FIGHT AND SURVIVE

Embark on an epic journey through diverse and treacherous environments, from lush forests to frozen tundras and desolate dead lands. In this two-phase adventure, every decision matters as you carve out your path to survival and glory.

DISCOVER AND CONQUER

In the first phase, explore sprawling maps filled with challenges and rewards. Clear enemy strongholds, complete tasks, and unlock powerful weapons, buildings, and upgrades. Build and customize your clan town, preparing for the ultimate test of survival.

DEFEND YOUR LEGACY

The second phase puts your preparation to the test. Face relentless enemy assaults as they target your town and its defenses. Survive waves of attacks by fortifying your buildings, upgrading weapons, and mastering specialized magic. Your survival depends on strategy, skill, and the strength of your clan.

BUILD YOUR ARSENAL AND MASTER YOUR SKILLS

  • Collect resources to upgrade weapons and buildings.

  • Enhance active and passive skills to gain the upper hand.

  • Train and evolve your loyal companion, unlocking unique forms and abilities.

  • Master specialized magic to turn the tide of battle.

  • Level up and become a force to be reckoned with.

PLAY TOGETHER, THRIVE TOGETHER

Join forces with friends in co-op mode to create powerful clans and build your city together. Strategize, share resources, and fight side by side to dominate the world. With a vast arsenal of weapons and countless upgrades.

KEY FEATURES

  • Multiple environments: Forests, snow maps, dead lands, and more.

  • Two-phase gameplay: Discovery and defense modes.

  • Clan-building mechanics: Create and upgrade your town with friends.

  • Rich progression system: Upgrade weapons, buildings, shields, skills, and companions.

  • Co-op multiplayer: Team up with friends to take on challenges together.

  • Variety of weapons: Unlock and master unique forms for endless tactical options.

Will you rise to the challenge, or will the world consume you?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB memory (dedicated VRAM or shared RAM), Shader Model 2.0+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Aleprok

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB memory (dedicated VRAM or shared RAM), Shader Model 2.0+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A cooperative survival and strategy game where you explore diverse environments, build and defend your clan town, upgrade weapons and skills, and master magic to survive relentless enemy attacks.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Korean, Polish, Slovak
